name: EGGS!
description:
The hen has lost all her eggs! It's time to get them back! Collect all the eggs and head to the door to advance to the next level.

Move with WASD, hold mouse 1 down to shoot the grappling hook and mouse 2 to reel it in.

Have fun!

Made for Ludum dare 45
Windows version has greater performance.

Sounds from OpenGameArt:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effect-pack

https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
